    • Constructor Detail

      • Fireball

        public Fireball(int x,
                int y,
                processing.core.PImage sprite,
                int dir)
        Constructor method for wizard's Fireball
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprite - image of Fireball
        dir - direction that Fireball is travelling in (same direction as wizard's movement)

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> allGremlins,
                 Wizard wizard,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Slime> slimes)
        Checks collisions and triggers movement of Fireball. Updates row and column numbers of Fireball depending on x and y-coordinates.
        Parameters:
        allTiles - list containing all tile objects on the map
        allGremlins - list containing all gremlin objects on the map
        wizard - wizard object on the map
        slimes - list containing all slimes on the map
